message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. I'm willing to give you a 20% discount if you buy it now, bringing the price down to $80. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure if I'll have any more high-quality products available in the future. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer. I will take advantage of the discount and purchase the product for $80.

I'm glad you liked the previous product! Unfortunately, this one is not as good. I want to be upfront with you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the full $100. However, I'm also offering a 'honesty guarantee': if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you an exclusive deal on the next product I have available. What do you think?
I appreciate your honesty and the offer for the next product. However, I think I'll pass on this one to avoid any potential issues in the future.

No problem at all! I completely understand your decision. I want to make sure you're completely satisfied with any product you buy from me. This time, I'll make it simple: I'm offering you a 'no-risk' deal. If you buy this product and it's not to your liking, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. The price remains at $100.
I appreciate the 'no-risk' deal. I'll take the product for $100, knowing I can get a refund if it doesn't meet my expectations.

I'm glad you felt comfortable taking the risk on the previous product! Now, I'd like to offer you a 'value guarantee'. I'll give you a $20 credit towards your next purchase if you buy this high-quality product for the full $100. This way, you'll not only get a great product, but you'll also get a head start on your next purchase. What do you think?
I like the value guarantee. I'll take the product for $100, and the $20 credit sounds like a great bonus for my next purchase.

You're on a roll! I'm glad you liked the value guarantee. This time, I'll make it even sweeter: I'll give you a 10% discount on this high-quality product, bringing the price down to $90. Plus, you'll still get the $20 credit towards your next purchase. This is a great opportunity to get an amazing product at a discounted price. What do you say?
I can't resist such a great deal. I'll take the product for $90, including the $20 credit for my next purchase.

You're making the most of these deals! I'll keep the momentum going. This high-quality product is one of my best, and I'm willing to give you an exclusive deal. If you buy this product, I'll throw in a FREE accessory that's worth $30, in addition to the $20 credit you already have. The total comes out to be $110, but I'll give you a 5% discount, bringing the price down to $104.50. What do you think?
This exclusive deal is too good to pass up. I'll take the product for $104.50, including the free accessory and the $20 credit.
